mapper.select: SELECT sku_id, sku_code, sku_name FROM wms_sku WHERE sku_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skuCode}, '%') OR sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skuName}, '%') ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT temp2.sku_level, s.sku_type_id, temp2.wsu_id, temp2.wsu_code, temp2.wsu_name FROM wms_sku s INNER JOIN ( SELECT temp1.sku_level, temp1.wsp_id, temp1.wsu_id, temp1.wsu_code, temp1.wsu_name FROM wms_sku_package p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pd.sku_level, pd.wsp_id, um.wsu_id, um.wsu_code, um.wsu_name FROM wms_sku_package_detail pd LEFT JOIN wms_sku_um um ON pd.wsu_id = um.wsu_id ) AS temp1 ON p.wsp_id = temp1.wsp_id ) AS temp2 ON s.wsp_id = temp2.wsp_id WHERE sku_id = #{skuId} ORDER BY sku_level

SELECT pd.wspd_id, pd.wsp_id, pd.sku_level, pd.wsu_id, pd.wsu_code, pd.wsu_name, pd.convert_qty FROM wms_sku_package p LEFT JOIN wms_sku_package_detail pd ON p.wsp_id = pd.wsp_id LEFT JOIN wms_sku s ON s.wsp_id = p.wsp_id WHERE s.sku_id = #{skuId}
